game.name: Pleasure Cruise
game.genres: 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, RPG, 시뮬레이션, 무료 플레이
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You will meet various female characters on a luxury cruise ship. Most of them have character flaws and you need to use super powers to make them admit their mistakes.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You will meet various female characters on a luxury cruise ship. Most of them have character flaws and you need to use super powers to make them admit their mistakes.
